location.formattedAddress: 62005 County Road 48, Greenport, NY 11944, United States of America

hotelTranslation.description:
Located in Greenport, 24 miles from Splish Splash, Hotel Moraine provides accommodations with free bikes, free private parking, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and a fitness center. The property has a private beach area, as well as a shared lounge and a bar. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a closet, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Each room is equipped with an electric tea pot, while certain rooms include a terrace and others also offer sea views. Guest rooms at Hotel Moraine are equipped with a seating area.

Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Greenport, like hiking.

Long Island MacArthur Airport is 46 miles away.
